title: ocs api breaks url, put and delete parameters
body:
this took me quite some while to debug. in response to 

owncloud/appframework#22 and
owncloud/news#205

i dont know why you are doing this but this breaks the whole url paramters:
https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/lib/api.php#l83

it also makes it impossible for me to parse the put parameters or delete paramters.

if we dont handle $_post or $_get or any other paramters here, why is there a special case for put and delete?

cc @tomneedham @bartv2 

i dunno, but if this is not fixed soon, i'll go for my own rest api which will be very simple to implement (part of it is already done, if not all). im not sure if i can open a pr for that since i dont know if this will affect the rest of the api.
